attributes.action: England in a first major  final for 55 years. Open Wembley to a full house.
attributes.background: Open Wembley to a full house Sunday night as entry requires double vaccination or a negative Covid test. Allow more genuine fans in giving England an even bigger advantage trying to be crowned European champions. It was increased from 22,500 to 60,000 plus through fear of losing it. It’s worked.

rejection.details: It takes up to 7 days for us to check petitions, so unfortunately it's not been possible to check this before 11 July.
